title: My Sister Asked Me What She Should Buy From Nordstrom’s Massive Half-Yearly Sale—I Told Her These 45 Elegant Items
description: My Sister Asked Me What She Should Buy From Nordstrom’s Massive Half-Yearly Sale—I Told Her These 45 Elegant Items
excerpt: From cashmere sweaters to chic ankle boots these are the elegant items worth buying from Nordstrom's Half-Yearly sale.
text: (Image credit: Getty Images)If you haven't already heard—Nordstrom's Half-Yearly Sale has officially begun and I've already ransacked hundreds of pages of sale products to see what's worth buying. My sister has wasted zero time asking me for a list of items she should get her hands on—particularly pieces that ooze an elegant and elevated vibe—that she could wear for work, the weekend, dates, and everything else in between. Of course, I happily obliged (what are sisters for, after all!).From chic boots to cashmere sweaters and tailored trousers, below, I'm sharing all the elegant items I suggested to my sister from Nordstrom's epic Half-Yearly Sale taking place now through January 6. If you're looking for some luxe and versatile pieces to add to your winter wardrobe then keep scrolling below—and add to cart before they sell out. Caslon Wool & Cashmere Cardigan Throw on over your tanks and tees. BP. 50mm Round Sunglasses The fashion set love an oval silhouette. Nordstrom High Low Mock Neck Fisherman Sweater A luxe and cozy sweater I can't resist. Vince Double Waist Cotton Twill Pants Nothing says chic quite like a pair of crisp white trousers. Nordstrom Arazio Kitten Heel Bootie No-one will believe these classic black ankle boots are under $90l. ASTR the Label Londyn Cowl Neck Coat Scarf coats are trending—and we can't get enough. Nordstrom Brushed Cashmere Tech Gloves Stock up on cashmere gloves while they're on sale. Nordstrom Wool & Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater Cozy, elegant, and effortless. I tried these recently and was floored at how great they fit. Pair with the skirt below. Treasure & Bond Bias Cut Satin Midi Skirt The perfect way to lean into this season's burgundy hues. Aquazzura Sellier Knee High Boot Investment designer boots you won't regret. Reformation Sleeveless Cashmere Sweater With Scarf It's not often Ref go on sale. JW Anderson The Chain Shoulder Bag Lauren Ralph Lauren Quilted Corduroy Contrast Jacket A quilted barn jacket oozes rich British-countryside vibes. Nordstrom Crewneck Cashmere Sweater The cashmere sweater our editors love. PAIGE Sasha Seamed Pocket High Waist Wide Leg Jeans Polished jeans you can dress up or down. Sam Edelman Double Breasted Coat A chic wool coat at a great price point. Lands' End Ez Touch Screen Cashmere Lined Leather Gloves Luxe brown leather gloves is the perfect finishing touch to your winter look. Topshop High V-Neck Sweater & Other Stories Press Crease Pants Yes to tailored trousers in this season's must-have espresso hues. Marc Fisher LTD Ubet Ballet Flat A pretty ballet flat to style with your jeans. Lauren Ralph Lauren Faux Shearling Jacket RUE SOPHIE Jeriel High Waist Straight Leg Pants You'll get use out of these year-round. Nordstrom Brushed Cashmere Beanie Rails Matilda Button-Up Cardigan Perfect for a winter white look. Favorite Daughter The Jordie High Waist Wide Leg Jeans The perfect high-waisted wide-leg silhouette. Rolla’s Toni Stretch Organic Cotton Ribbed Crop Tank Scoop up this versatile tank before it sells out. Add instant polish to your outfit with this sleek silhouette. Nordstrom V-Neck Cashmere Sweater A sweater that oozes French-girl vibes. Ana Luisa Gold Pendant Necklace A pretty pendant to style with your sweaters. Topshop Cable Stitch Cardigan Bernardo Long Coat With Quilted Lining A staple you'll reach for year after year. Reformation Layla Print Maxi Skirt Lean into this season's leopard print trend in a chic way. Treasure & Bond Short Sleeve Crewneck Sweater Open Edit Wide Puffy Hoop Earrings Bold earrings for under $20? Add to cart. Treasure & Bond Oversize V-Neck Sweater Style with slip skirts and jeans alike. Vince Polka Dot Sheer Stretch Silk Midi Skirt Love the idea of wearing this with a relaxed black sweater. Chic knee-high boots that won't break the bank. Brave+True Skye Sleeveless Turtleneck Sweater Just add high-waisted jeans, a black belt, and kitten heels. Open Edit Luxe Sculpt Maxi Skirt They styling possibilities are endless. Alex Mill Paris Stripe Cotton & Cashmere Cardigan A striped knit is always a good idea. Veronica Beard Daniela High Waist Ankle Straight Leg Jeans Are these not the perfect straight-leg jeans? Reformation Brooklyn Organic Cotton Sweater
html:
If you haven't already heard—Nordstrom's Half-Yearly Sale has officially begun and I've already ransacked hundreds of pages of sale products to see what's worth buying. My sister has wasted zero time asking me for a list of items she should get her hands on—particularly pieces that ooze an elegant and elevated vibe—that she could wear for work, the weekend, dates, and everything else in between. Of course, I happily obliged (what are sisters for, after all!).


From chic boots to cashmere sweaters and tailored trousers, below, I'm sharing all the elegant items I suggested to my sister from Nordstrom's epic Half-Yearly Sale taking place now through January 6. If you're looking for some luxe and versatile pieces to add to your winter wardrobe then keep scrolling below—and add to cart before they sell out.

Caslon

Wool & Cashmere Cardigan

Throw on over your tanks and tees.

BP.

50mm Round Sunglasses

The fashion set love an oval silhouette.

Nordstrom

High Low Mock Neck Fisherman Sweater

A luxe and cozy sweater I can't resist.

Vince

Double Waist Cotton Twill Pants

Nothing says chic quite like a pair of crisp white trousers.

Nordstrom

Arazio Kitten Heel Bootie

No-one will believe these classic black ankle boots are under $90l.

ASTR the Label

Londyn Cowl Neck Coat

Scarf coats are trending—and we can't get enough.

Nordstrom

Brushed Cashmere Tech Gloves

Stock up on cashmere gloves while they're on sale.

Nordstrom

Wool & Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater

Cozy, elegant, and effortless.

I tried these recently and was floored at how great they fit.

Pair with the skirt below.

Treasure & Bond

Bias Cut Satin Midi Skirt

The perfect way to lean into this season's burgundy hues.

Aquazzura

Sellier Knee High Boot

Investment designer boots you won't regret.

Reformation

Sleeveless Cashmere Sweater With Scarf

It's not often Ref go on sale.

The Chain Shoulder Bag

Quilted Corduroy Contrast Jacket

A quilted barn jacket oozes rich British-countryside vibes.

Nordstrom

Crewneck Cashmere Sweater

The cashmere sweater our editors love.

PAIGE

Sasha Seamed Pocket High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

Polished jeans you can dress up or down.

Sam Edelman

Double Breasted Coat

A chic wool coat at a great price point.

Lands' End

Ez Touch Screen Cashmere Lined Leather Gloves

Luxe brown leather gloves is the perfect finishing touch to your winter look.

Topshop

High V-Neck Sweater

& Other Stories

Press Crease Pants

Yes to tailored trousers in this season's must-have espresso hues.

Marc Fisher LTD

Ubet Ballet Flat

A pretty ballet flat to style with your jeans.

Lauren Ralph Lauren

Faux Shearling Jacket

RUE SOPHIE

Jeriel High Waist Straight Leg Pants

You'll get use out of these year-round.

Nordstrom

Brushed Cashmere Beanie

Rails

Perfect for a winter white look.

Favorite Daughter

The Jordie High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

The perfect high-waisted wide-leg silhouette.

Rolla’s

Toni Stretch Organic Cotton Ribbed Crop Tank

Scoop up this versatile tank before it sells out.

Add instant polish to your outfit with this sleek silhouette.

Nordstrom

V-Neck Cashmere Sweater

A sweater that oozes French-girl vibes.

A pretty pendant to style with your sweaters.

Topshop

Cable Stitch Cardigan

A staple you'll reach for year after year.

Layla Print Maxi Skirt

Lean into this season's leopard print trend in a chic way.

Treasure & Bond

Short Sleeve Crewneck Sweater

Wide Puffy Hoop Earrings

Bold earrings for under $20? Add to cart.

Oversize V-Neck Sweater

Style with slip skirts and jeans alike.

Love the idea of wearing this with a relaxed black sweater.
